creator: steve.gillette@gmail.com
text:
When trying to run Microsoft Update
(http://update.microsoft.com/microsoftupdate/v6/default.aspx?ln=en-us) 
from behind an Apache Forward Proxy, the user will encouter error 0x80072EE2.
This happens on WinXP, Win2K (Server and Workstation), and Win2K3 Server.

creator: wrowe@apache.org
text:
not really a surprise, it's a notoriously non-compliant app.  But give it
another try and report back, might be fixed now by ms.

creator: covener@gmail.com
text:
just guessing, re-open if this still occurs on recent level of Apache

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 18757 ***
